data.comment: The first-half is under way at Ghelamco Arena - Gent kick-off to start the match.
Tim Kleindienst is replacing Laurent Depoitre for the home team.
In the minute 24, Alessio Castro-Montes scores to make it 1-0 at Ghelamco Arena.
Theo Bongonda (Genk) levels the match at 1-1 with a header.
The first-half has come to a close in Ghent.
In the minute 46, It's Genk with the kick-off after the break.
Dries Wouters is on a sub for Bastien Toma for Genk.
Daniel Munoz (Genk) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 62, Wim De Decker (Gent) is making a second substitution, with Osman Bukari replacing Roman Bezus.
Jere Uronen (Genk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Kouassi Eboue is replacing Kristian Thorstvedt for Genk at Ghelamco Arena.
In the minute 73, Tim Kleindienst is booked for the home team.
The away team replace Paul Onuachu with Cyriel Dessers.
Gent make their third substitution with Vadis Odjidja replacing Sven Kums.
In the minute 84, Genk take a 1-2 lead thanks to Patrik Hrosovsky.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
